casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Larry LEGGETT 519P99-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Larry Leggett, for Leggett, Larry. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of July 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
